article_title: ‘Morning Glory’ owner seeks local House seat
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

og.description: West Yellowstone residents who visit the polls June 3 for Montana’s primary election will have the option to vote for one of their own on the Democrat ticket. Morning Glory
